data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Madhubani, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Madhubani, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Madhubani.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Madhubani, Bihar, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Madhubani, Bihar, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, help the 49,361 believers in Madhubani to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 4,438,039 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Madhubani, Bihar, India will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Madhubani to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.
